item.title: Bad Bunny Says He Opted Out of U.S. Tour Dates Due to ICE Raid Concerns
item.description: The singer and actor is explaining the “many reasons why I didn’t show up in the U.S.” on his upcoming Debí Tirar Más Fotos World Tour.

item.title: Move Over, Met Gala — The U.S. Open Is New York’s See-and-Be-Seen Event of the Year
item.description: In recent years, power players in Hollywood, media, and beyond have elbowed their way down the tennis tournament’s blue carpet to strike deals and be photographed. For the USTA, it’s all by design.
